name: pro-1
description:
Minor Project I (developed in the fifth semester of the BTech. at MIT - 2023); members are Abhishek Malviya, Aditya Sharma, Bhumika Jain and Chandan Ramteke.
This project is about a survey application, named as SurveySync.
SurveySync is applied for conducting all kinds of surveys and generating insights and information about them; either in textual, numerical or graphical form.
